Newly-weds Chen Liang (Lam Wai Tu) and Liu Miao Li (Lau Ng Kei) are travelling in a bus held up by three thugs. As the other passengers are engaging the thugsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ attention, Chen quietly hides $700 but he is caught by one of the robbers. Hsiao Tao Wang (Wong Chung) stabs Chen to death against the advice of his accomplices Lin Pao ((Tung Lam) and Ah Ling (Wong Yu).
 Sympathetic people give donations to help the widow. The donors include Fan Wei Chien (Wang Hsieh) who personally goes to her house to give her $500. Fan also advises her to bank her money amounting to thousands of dollars given by the kind-heatred citizens. Miao Li lsitend to his advice and takes her money to the bank.
